title: Shining Ornament
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Uwaah~! So pretty! Ah, look, look. There’s a trumpet ornament!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ooh, good find~! There’s a concert hall here, so the tree ornaments’ motifs are of orchestral instruments. Ai thought it fits you perfectly, Riko~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I see! I wonder if there’s a piano one too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>There definitely is. Let’s find it together~.... or, there it is! Sorry, Ai found it already....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, it was closer than we thought, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hey, want to take a selfie with this tree as the background?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah! I’ll show off the picture to everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Then, let’s go. Get closer! More, more! Clo~ser!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Isn’t it cramped?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s cold, so it’s fine! Alright, here we go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
